name: John Leider
bio: I'm the author of [Vuetify](https://github.com/vuetifyjs/vuetify) and an open source fanatic. I served for 6 years in the U.S. Army Infantry and started developing in 2014 after I finished my contract. In October of 2017 was able to quit my regular job to work full-time in OSS and currently run Vuetify, LLC with my wonderful wife, [Heather Leider](https://github.com/heatherleider).
